text: This piece was updated after publication with more information. In an unexpected last - minute shift, Lionsgate has dropped the John Travolta project Gotti just 10 days before its release. Gotti, a biopic about infamous mobster John Gotti, was sold back to its producers Tuesday, Entertainment Weekly reported. Production company Emmett / Furla / Oasis is expected to seek new distribution, but the movie is unlikely to make its December 15 release date. Former Entourage cast member Kevin Connolly directed the mob drama, and the project also features Travolta ’ s wife Kelly Preston as Victoria Gotti. While the reasons for the sale remain unclear, this isn ’ t the first obstacle Gotti has encountered throughout its production.
